scripts.start-cpp: node -e "const path = require('path'); const { spawn } = require('child_process'); const fullPath = path.join(__dirname, '../Backend/Prototype/x64/Debug/Prototype.exe'); const options = { cwd: path.resolve(__dirname, '../Backend/Prototype'), env: Object.assign({}, process.env), shell: true }; console.log('Resolved path to C++ executable: ', fullPath); spawn(fullPath, [], options);"
